name: slack-robot
description: Simple robot for your slack integration

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha tests/**/*.js --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel/register && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.prepublish: babel -d src/ lib/ && mkdir -p action && cp src/BaseAction.js action/

author: Fatih Kalifa <fatihkalifa@gmail.com>
